summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4163 for the improvement of 5th Avenue North, from Denny Way to the alley between Aloha Street and Ward Street; by the installation of a street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 49702, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
